attributes.action: Health and social care workers to not have increase in national insurance
attributes.additional_details: Because I do not as well as many others in England think it’s fair that we have all had to work throughout the pandemic whilst other people have had over a year break. Instead of clapping for the nhs, show your respect and kindness by not increasing our national insurance and we would appreciate it otherwise we’re paying for all the people that have had over a years worth of holiday whilst feeling safe whilst we have risked ours and our families lives.
attributes.background: Do not increase the national insurance for workers that have worked throughout the whole pandemic putting our lives at risk when there was no vaccine and little ppe or testing to start with. Professions include, health and social care workers, shop assistants, etc.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Exclude Key workers from the National Insurance rise:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596592
